meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gameobjects

Class GameObjectController

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gameobjects.GameObjectController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class GameObjectController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Controller for all the game objects. The most important controller in the game which holds the information of all the other controllers. This controller is the main interface for other classes to communicate with each other.

    Holds the data for drawable and updateable game objects and manages creating and destroying of all the objects.

    Author:
    vpyyhtia

    • Method Detail

      • bindTextureController

        public void bindTextureController(TextureController textureController)
        Binds TextureController to GameObjectController. This has to called before adding new game objects to the game or otherwise they will not have textures.
        Parameters:
        textureController -

      • fire

        public void fire(ShootingShip ship)
        Shoot with ship. Uses FiringController for firing.
        Parameters:
        ship - that's going to fire

      • getShip

        public Ship getShip()
        Creates a new ship. Default ship is SpaceFighter which will be created in the ShipController.
        Returns:
        Ship new SpaceFighter object

      • bindProjectile

        public void bindProjectile(Ship ship,
                           Projectile.ProjectileType projectileType)
        Bind projectile to the ship's main weapon.
        Parameters:
        ship - that's going to get a new projectileType
        projectileType - type of the Projectile that are going to be shot from the ship

      • bindProjectile

        public void bindProjectile(Weapon weapon,
                           Projectile.ProjectileType projectileType)
        Bind projectile to the specific weapon.
        Parameters:
        weapon - that's going to get a new projectileType
        projectileType - type of the Projectile to be used in the selected weapon

      • changeWeapon

        public void changeWeapon(Ship ship)
        Change to the next weapon from a specific ship. Doesn't do anything if there's only one weapon in the ship (or no weapons at all).
        Parameters:
        ship -

      • addRadar

        public void addRadar(GameObject object)
        Creates a radar in the game window. Radar shows player's position in the center and other important game objects near the player. It's also possible to use other GameObject's for the radar's center object.
        Parameters:
        object - that's going to be the center point in the radar

      • killRandomAsteroid

        public void killRandomAsteroid()
        Starts destroying asteroids from the game. This method is usually used after the level is finished and all the remaining asteroids is going to be destroyed. This goes through all the PhysicsObjects and destroyed the Asteroids from that list.
